p: Respiratory ( http://www.epithelix.com/products/mucilair) and EpiIntestinal ( https://www.mattek.com/products/epiintestinal/ tissues) were ordered from Epithelix and MatTek biotechnology companies. There, the tissues are developed from anonymized samples and after Ethical approval. The study was conducted according to the Declaration of Helsinki on biomedical research (Hong Kong amendment, 1989), and the research protocol was approved by our local ethics committee.
